text: I chose to talk about Instagram, it's an application to share your pictures, and create a story like on Snapchat or Facebook to share a moment of your life or what you do during the day, and you can also talk to your friends and create groups with many of them. I create my account in april 2017 approximately and at the beginning i wouldn't share pictures of me, because i didn't want to expose myself too much, because on Instagram most people show their life way too much. So i decided to only shared landscape photos and it was pretty good. But at one point i share a picture with my friends it was on june 2018 and i saw under my photo some nice comments from my friends, it's maybe naive but it's made me happy. And i think it's thanks to my friends that i have more confidence in myself and i post more pictures of myself. As i said before, to me it was a good experience because i have some awesome friends who are really nice, and i think i am not a person with "enemi", i get along pretty well everyone. What is more serious is the harassment, it's can happened to everyone, famous people or a classmate. Because with the anonymity it's easier to hide behind your computer to judge and criticize others. And i think you have to be sure of yourself for create an account on social network and to have a minimum of supervision on your children because it can be very dangerous.
